Negative_Review: Nothing
Positive_Review: Perfect location for our stay Room was very comfortable and larger than we expected for a cosy room Breakfast buffet was very good large variety of choice

Negative_Review: we were in a room on the third floor overlooking the strand although the window was double glazed and there was was a wooden shutter there was still a lot of noise but not as bad as the room next door the walls must be paper thin the next room switched there tv on at 7 30 am we could here every word and it woke us up
Positive_Review: location ideal if visiting the west end theater land just a 5 minute walk away the inhouse carvery restaurant is fabulous one of the best carverys i have ever had

Negative_Review: The hotel inside was very cold Especially my room I called and asked for a portable heater nothing happened for 1 5 hours I called again and nothing happened for another 30 minutes I was too cold and felt uncomfortable I had to wear my coat and called the last time and finally got the portable heater after 2 hours and 30 min waiting and 3 calls I understand if they have to search for it and all but they could at least give me a heads up and let me know what is going on I found the service to be very poor The staff in the hotel were generally not kind or friendly The front desk staff were the worst The check in worker was mumbling and did not speak clearly when talking to me I could not hear what she was saying She didn t look like she wanted to talk to me at all The impression I got was that I SHOULD FEEL SORRY to even ask questions such as where is the gym and do I have to pay for the newspaper Her directions to the Gym for instance were It s there to the right up there somewhere you can find it which I didn t find helpful When I called regarding the heater they sounded very annoyed as well Very frustrating But at least the workers in the breakfast restaurant were very friendly I had around 10 interactions with staff during my stay and other than the personnel in the restaurant all were poor
Positive_Review: This hotel closed to Kimchee Korean restaurant

Negative_Review: we couldn t fault anything
Positive_Review: the staff were so friendly and helpful the food was excellent and the room was very clean and comfortable The perfect location

Negative_Review: Long line during check in Super slow free internet Terrible mobile signal for O2 Super small bathroom in their standard single rooms No lock on the bathroom door if you re a woman traveling alone an extra look is important Paper thin walls I kept hearing people walking to their rooms talking and doors slamming all night long Check out staff were not really nice I guess once you ve paid they no longer felt the need to be polite
Positive_Review: Great location nice comfortable lobby Strong water pressure in shower

Negative_Review: The hairdryer my wife used cut out continuously which meant it took a long time to dry her hair The room was small but quite adequate the bed was very comfortable generally ok
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: The view out of our window looked onto nothing but other rooms Windows but didn t book the hotel for a view TV faced bed not sofa
Positive_Review: Lovely rooms nice hotel areas friendly staff good service comfortable bed nice in room living space spacious room

Negative_Review: Our room was very small and check in was very slow with long lines Breakfast was also fair not sure it was worth paying for Given the price I was hoping for a more posh hotel it was pretty basic The walls were also quite thin I could hear my neighbor s phone conversation in Chinese starting at 5am Still given the location the room size and price were probably to be expected
Positive_Review: Location was excellent in the middle of Covent Garden easy walk to Tube station The room was also clean and comfortable

Negative_Review: Some staff were less than attentive and seemed more interested in chatting amongst themselves Not with me personally but this is just an observation
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Room was small as against price Heater was a little noisy Mobile reception was weak probably due to interior room
Positive_Review: Location is near perfect Trafalgar Sauare Covent Garden Piccadilly Circus are within walking distance

Negative_Review: Breakfast worst in the world for 50 a day per couple Heating not working in LONDON During February an you imagine Had to talk to 5 people for 2 days before getting a heater on the last and 6th nights there UNACCEPTABLE If this hotel was in the states they would have jumped for a solution Again do not believe the ads
Positive_Review: Location and only the Location

Negative_Review: I booking this hotel by this website booking com and I specificed very clear when I gave my details 2 adults and 1 child The website gave me the price for 2 rooms and I thought this was the right price until I arrived to the hotel and the person in the reception told to us why did you booking 2 rooms when you are family of 3 You don t need to room He said To us that we couldn t have any refund because it was the hotel police but he gave to us one room more big which was the executive room which was nice from this member of the staff but I was very dessapointment because I paid doble price for only one room that I need for me my husband and my son I won t booking again another hotel by this website booking com because next time I rather call the hotel and make my reservation by phone
Positive_Review: The hotel is in excellent location It is very clean spotless The bed are very comfort and the staff is very polite

Negative_Review: Breakfast was rather tired Over cooked nasty fried eggs poor quality bacon and bread etc
Positive_Review: Great location Room was better size than anticipated recently refurbished and clean Staff always helpful and friendly

Negative_Review: The room was an executive room the wall in the bedroom was damp and marked very disappointed as this was my Daughters 21st Stay in lots of hotels and this was in my opinion definatly like any executive room I have stayed in the hallways near the rooms had peeling paint and looked neglected all though the main areas were very nice
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Shower over bath flooded the bathroom floor despite our best efforts The room was very cosy OK for us as we were out and about a lot
Positive_Review: Very clean The location was ideal for our stay

Negative_Review: The noise of the night bus going over the manhole cover every hour
Positive_Review: That there were bars and restaurant open in the hotel when we returned from our night out

Negative_Review: Bed was rock solid It was a windy day but the noise out back was horrendous as was the view Along with a strong breeze through the window although the window was supposed to be fully closed luckily the wooden shutters helped 100 for room 1 night only on a Sunday not worth it if I m being honest
Positive_Review: Location was very good and staff were nice

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Reception staff were very friendly Arrived at mid day and room was ready Door guy was lovely and friendly Plumbing work was being done but didn t affect us

Negative_Review: Not overly happy that the cleaner came into the room whilst I was in the shower and my wife was drying her hair on the morning of our departure Next time leave the Do Not Disturb sign on the door Obviously keen to get started on her day
Positive_Review: Very comfortable room not massive but adequate Very clean and quiet Breakfast was excellent and well managed considering the number of guests All staff polite and helpful

Negative_Review: We got told we had a free upgrade to Executive room nice but it was a standard double room no big deal
Positive_Review: Nice facility and location good staff breakfast nice

Negative_Review: Room size quite small however adequate for a one night stay View from room run down back of buildings however not in room very long so not a huge problem
Positive_Review: Location Breakfast Staff

Negative_Review: Nothing
Positive_Review: Everything about The Strand Palace Hotel is inviting This hotel is a stone throw from all the main tourist routes Public transport is on your doorstep and the facilities of the establishment cater for all your needs

Negative_Review: Everything is very expensive in the hotel The price for the room is too high Long queues during check in The facilities in the room are really old Cleaning of rooms inadequate
Positive_Review: Good location

Negative_Review: Paying for early check in seems a bit over the top if one s room which has been pre paid is available why should have to pay another 20 to get access to it
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: The small room is really really small Not sound proof at all I could hear everything from the next room including someone snoring and people walking up and down the corridor The toilet is almost obstructing the panel door of the shower cubicle and it would be very difficult for an obese person
Positive_Review: the location was good

Negative_Review: With two women sharing the bedroom the complimentary shampoo body wash etc needed doubling Better organization for breakfast in the dining room felt like being in school when taken in crocodile fashion around to 2nd dining room
Positive_Review: Snacks in the caf excellent Al staff friendly and helpful Ambience of hotel excellent Facilities fine

Negative_Review: Room too small impossible for two people to get out of bed at once One side tight up against wall No where to put a reachable glass or cup Stayed in better bedrooms in many other places
Positive_Review: Very accessible Foyer bright and very busy Staff very obliging Decided not to eat at Strand Palace Location very good

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: location warmth welcoming the breakfast was amazing And right next to Lyceum theatre which is what we mainly went for Couldn t hear any outside noise either

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Very friendly and efficient staff The power in my room wasn t working when I got up there Within two minutes a guy was there to fix it Very comfy room and nice bathroom I ordered room service and the food was very good as well as the service from the waiter

Negative_Review: Too long to book in The hotel needs to think about actively offering people with access issues a quicker means of booking in I told staff I couldn t stand for long periods because of a long term knee problem however I was told I had to wait 20 minutes to check in as a large group had arrived Really sad because the hotel was lovely Maybe the hotel could suggest it s busy check in times in advance
Positive_Review: Nice room Great location Very comfy clean bed for the weekend

Negative_Review: The standard room is very small for two Luckily I was alone I would appreciate some extras like sleepers or sewing material Wifi was satisfactory
Positive_Review: I loved the location the staff and the cleanliness The room at the back was very quiet although kind of claustrophobic

Negative_Review: Single room was small On enquiringly about staying a second night the same room would cost 270
Positive_Review: Room was ready early when I arrived at 11am Hotel was quiet Location is great very central First night was a bargain around 100 Able to leave luggage all day complimentary Free wifi

Negative_Review: The WiFi was worse than when I stayed last year It isn t free and available throughout The WiFi couldn t be accessed from my room and only very slowly and intermittently in the foyer and bar In addition a speed of 7 Mbs is pitiful for an operation like the Strand Palace to be giving customers in this day and age The reception staff have a plan of which indicates rooms with limited WiFi so if the problem is known about why not do something about it
Positive_Review: The location is great and the staff friendly and willing to do those extra little things to help you The quality of the food is very good as well

Negative_Review: We had the cosy double room I m 6ft 4 and I was happy with the room until stepping into the shower in which I had to crouch in because the shower ceiling was so low and couldn t physically stand up straight in I knew I was getting the costly room but didn t expect the shower also to be part of the cosy package
Positive_Review: I really liked the lay out of the hotel and felt really welcomed when walking in greeted by a friendly face each time

Negative_Review: Design of the Hotel Rooms Very dated not tastefully renovated Bathrooms are ridiculous small Overall very bad lighting furniture and interior is very weak Stains on the carpet Breakfast in the morning was crowded felt like a typical tourist hotel with standard food Quality is okay Very Disappointed There are way better Hotels in central London for the same price Never stay there again
Positive_Review: Location is very good room size okay Checkin Checkout friendly

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Nice place Very central don t have to travel far at all to find what you need Staff were very accommodating and pleasant Particularly Francesco who was very friendly and helpful when we checked in Breakfast was very good also

Negative_Review: I was very annoyed at the cleaner waking us up at 8 20 in the morning when we had travelled a distance the night before and were due to travel back that evening When we mentioned it before leaving in reception they had no idea with what to do with the complaint Was ment to be a relaxing weekend away but was made to feel uncomfortable for sleeping there
Positive_Review: Hotel was very clean Room was nice

Negative_Review: Nothing negative to write about
Positive_Review: The location of the hotel was very good Our stay was very comfortable It was well within walking distance to all the sight seeing places

Negative_Review: Single rooms incredibly small so much so the bathroom is a hazard Constantly hitting back or side on door handle getting in and out of bathroom
Positive_Review: Great location Decent little gym

Negative_Review: You pay for the location not so much the comfort Uncomfortable bed and pillows and I m not fussy usually I sleep anywhere and everywhere
Positive_Review: Location location location

Negative_Review: Not really bad but it was quite a long queue to check in on Saturday afternoon not all the stations were manned
Positive_Review: Excellent location Professional and friendly staff from doorman to reception staff Modern clean spacious room Thanks for the upgrade from Cosy Double to Standard Double

Negative_Review: I have visited the hotel before and this time I have found out several things I was not happy with Breakfast has deteriorated a bit and there are short cuts in the butter and marmelate range and their qualitiy no taste flavor Stale apples on offer Only one type of tea now available in the rooms The consierge would give only the option to pay 65 UK pounds for a taxi to Heathrow when I discovered that there are other services so that you can pay as little as 18 UK pounds for the same trip Furthermore unwilling to keep your name and or help you find another hotel visitor to share the taxi cost I stayed 6 nights and if I had not asked for a change of sheets they would not have done it Horrible brand of shampoo and body cream and terrible packaging no pleasant smell bags do not stand on the shower tray and they make a mess when squeezed What is wrong with a broad bottom bottle to stand on the rails of the tray rather than always slipping through the rails and landing on the shower floor Irritating not to be able to switch TV channels without the big screen showing and to have to do it mannualy each time
Positive_Review: Best service at the luggage desk and the smilling porter

Negative_Review: The taps in the bathroom on the bath could do with being replaced The pillows also were a little hard
Positive_Review: All the staff were very helpful from the guy on Reception to the Door Man

Negative_Review: All good although we used the restaurant on a previous visit and that wasn t great
Positive_Review: Well appointed hotel in a great location Great value with a decent sized room for London and perfect location for sightseeing less than 5 minutes walk from Covent Garden Piazza

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Local to theatre Adelphi and also Trafalgar Square 10k Winter Run on 31st Jan starting in Trafalgar Square but still close enough for Covent Garden and Theatreland Plenty of bar space and seats in the lobby

Negative_Review: Rooms need an update but everything worked and we were comfortable enough
Positive_Review: Great location perfect for Covent Garden the West End and the South Bank convenient and helpful left luggage facility

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The room was clean the staff friendly We didn t have breakfast there so I can t comment on the food The location is very central and convenient

Negative_Review: The bathroom was like a fridge extremely unpleasant after getting out of a warm bed in the middle of the night No hearing whatsoever didn t have time to complain as checking out there was a queue otherwise I would have aired my views
Positive_Review: Being upgraded to executive was lovely added extras in room definitely made me smile Breakfast was top class excellent attentive staff in the executive dining room

Negative_Review: In the foyer while enjoying drinks the maid came round and polished the tables we were using Not a bad thing as the place is spotless but not very pleasant with the spray when you are relaxing and catching up with friends Everything else was excellent this was a minor point in a great weekend
Positive_Review: An excellent location for the money Great facilities The staff were very pleasant The room sizes were generous for the location

Negative_Review: the rooms are noisy with both street noise and corridor noise everything works but the bathroom equipment is on the old side Carpet could be a little cleaner For an average motel these points would be ok but for the price of this place still cheap for London one expects a little better or maybe this is just central London prices who knows Also the information the guys at the baggage hold gave us about public transport was incorrect
Positive_Review: great location comfortable bed

Negative_Review: The bathroom was very small Drying space after taking a shower was awkward The noise transference from the next door room was upsetting as next door neighbours carried on talking very loudly until gone 0130 the morning we both had important appointments to get to that day Every word was audible We were unable to use the shaver socket in the bathroom Reported this and reminded twice but no action taken no feedback so for the three days of our stay the socket remained unmended The organisation at breakfast was poor appreciate that the hotel is large and there are a high number of people to get through but it was pretty chaotic The beds could do with more comfortable mattresses and the pillows were hard and lumpy
Positive_Review: Facilities clean and the hotel is in an excellent location for Covent Garden and theatre land

Negative_Review: The room had a small bathroom and the hotel corridors looked tired in definate need of redecoration
Positive_Review: Good location nice sized room that was clean and modern Comfortable bed free bottled water

Negative_Review: The average quality price is expensive on my point of view
Positive_Review: This hotel is very well placed Very central and we can go in every well known place by walk

Negative_Review: I couldn t find fault at all other than we were not offered complimentary newspaper and the couple next to us were But if we had desperately wanted one we would of asked
Positive_Review: The whole experience was pleasurable location room dinner and service We were able to leave our case the following day would definitely stay there again

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The location was excellent our room was a good size considering where we were located I particularly liked the wooden shutters which blocked out both light and noise The breakfast was excellent and only 10

Negative_Review: Double room very pokey small bed stashed in a corner was given a small dark room and when I complained was given a very slightly less small noisey room
Positive_Review: Location is good

Negative_Review: The room was small and cold with a terrible view out of the window and wooden curtains
Positive_Review: For the many sights around Covent Garden the location could not be better

Negative_Review: On arrival our greeting from the receptionist was clipped and verging on unfriendly She didn t make us feel welcome and wasn t very helpful or understanding at all We expected a warm cheerful hello at the very least We had travelled over 300 miles to be there
Positive_Review: The doorman was cheerful and helpful Everything worked in our room but it felt and looked very tired and old The hotel could do with a big injection of money to bring it into the 21st century The location was excellent for Covent Garden and the theatre we were going to

Negative_Review: took a while to answer phones at reception but i expect they were very busy more staff needed maybe
Positive_Review: great customer service and very spacious and clean

Negative_Review: More time to stay there
Positive_Review: Perfect location for everything to see and do sight wise and entertainment wise also has the feelgood factor gained from a top quality hotel

Negative_Review: Very busy at all times at reception breakfast elevators etc The room was quite small
Positive_Review: The hotel is at a very central location and the premises rooms are well maintained and clean

Negative_Review: The reception area is fragranced with something strange and the lighting is horrifically ugly but I guess it s just not to my taste
Positive_Review: The reception staff were friendly and the concierge was fantastic he brought me an ironing board at midnight within no time at all The room and bathroom were spacious and spotlessly clean I also appreciated the tea coffee making facilities especially the biscuits and complementary water Breakfast is adequate for the price

Negative_Review: in need of a facelift the corridors were shabby and carpets dirty sweet wrapper on floor in my room bed and pillows very average bathroom very tight and poorly ventilated towels quite old shampoos etc a bit on the cheap side attached sports bar quite uninviting uninspiring
Positive_Review: gym was quite good small but enough new and useful equipment check in worked smoothly at a busy time changes to room layout from twin beds to a double make for night 2 of my stay as promised

Negative_Review: Woken up by cleaning staff by knocking on the door and entering the room
Positive_Review: Concierge was very helpful for the few extra things we needed for the room and in directing and informing us on best travel options

Negative_Review: The cleaners opened our door to clean the room at 8am whilst we were still in bed didn t think we d need to put a do not disturb sign on the door that early in the morning when we would be vacating the room that day anyway
Positive_Review: Excellent location room was very spacious comfortable

Negative_Review: Nothing it was lovely
Positive_Review: The location was brilliant easy walking to Covent Garden and the theatres Our room was very comfortable and clean Breakfast was excellent we were in the executive restaurant and had table service this wasn t extra it came with the room The staff were very friendly and helpful Overall a really great stay

Negative_Review: Their policy of charging 20 per room to enter it early if it happens to be ready when you check in early is disgraceful Also do not order a paper on a Sunday as they always deliver it without the magazines yet charge full price
Positive_Review: Brilliantly located 10 minutes from Charing Cross station Comfortable and quiet room and free water provided

Negative_Review: There was a lot of queueing checking in checking out and for the concierge Hotel has been given a makeover since my last stay Felt as a result it had lost a little character
Positive_Review: Location was the most important factor

Negative_Review: Beds were rather hard Service at breakfast a bit haphazard other customers were directed to our table on both mornings so we had to move
Positive_Review: Very friendly doorman Excellent location Pleasant bar area

Negative_Review: bit more comfort in the room it was quite basic but very clean I got a very good deal so it didn t matter so much but I d have been miffed it I had paid more
Positive_Review: Fantastic location friendly staff Good breakfast

Negative_Review: Carvery Very poor dried up veg etc and very slow service Complaint gave me a refund but will not dine there again
Positive_Review: Pleasant room with all facilities

Negative_Review: I would have preferred additional wall sockets and more readiness for help in terms of providing adapters to different electrical outlets Hotel management should consider changing upgrading the hairdryers that lack practicality and mobility hairdryer is stuck to the wall and will function as long as one keeps his finger pressed not very ergonomic or practical
Positive_Review: I loved the location with proximity to theaters to Covent Garden I loved the sort of vintage grandeur of the hotel

Negative_Review: Old tired hotel which lacked the basics Rooms are way badly designed especially when they are so small Uncomfortable beds and toilet shoved into the corner of the bathroom so that it couldn t be used properly
Positive_Review: Only good point is central location

Negative_Review: Queue at check in but to be expected I suppose as it was 2 2 30pm There was also an enormous queue to be seated for breakfast which although looked horrendous when we first arrived went down really quick Paid a really high price this time we have stayed before at this hotel before a lot cheaper nothing going on in London so not clear why was so expensive
Positive_Review: Loved the location staff were polite and knowledgeable Breakfast was very good Lots of choice all fresh lovely old building Room was nice

Negative_Review: Huge hotel with outdated rooms en horrible soundproofing single glass windows duct tape to minimise the draft Extreem ventilation noises in our room on the second floor kept us awake for the first 2 nights
Positive_Review: The location was good The staff was very sympathetic and arranged a much quieter room for our last night there Far from the ventilation system and with a window that opens Woken up only at 7 8 AM by the sweet sounds of water pipes rattling and duct taping in a room further down the hall

Negative_Review: Hotel was clean but small points missed The underside of the bathroom tap was covered in toothpaste and the previous guests saliva toothpaste
Positive_Review: Free upgrade Large room adequate facilities

Negative_Review: expensive bar food and drinks but it is London Tv position in the room to the left of the bed bending your neck to watch it
Positive_Review: location was excellent bed comfortable

Negative_Review: The bed was to hard and the pillows as well No shelf at the bathroom to set your toilet bag Have to set it on the floor
Positive_Review: Good breakfast Location is good close to shopping area in Covent Garden Nice but quit expencive bars at the hotel Good service we got changed room because we were not happy with the room we got first It was tiny and had a bad smell from the bathroom I came back to my room after breakfast while the cleaner was there and she would not let me into the room before she checked my key Very good

Negative_Review: The room standard twin was the smallest I have ever stayed in anywhere in the world Impractical room and bathroom
Positive_Review: The location staff and cleanliness of the hotel was very good

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: excellently positioned for West End Theatres Covent Garden and main shops in Piccadilly and regent Street Room plenty big enough for a few nights stay All staff encountered friendly and very helpful Breakfast plentiful and tasty

Negative_Review: Noisy at night Walls very thin and can hear conversations in next room No way is this a four star hotel Budget quality
Positive_Review: Location and reasonable price Bathroom clean and powerful shower

Negative_Review: The Executive Room we were allocated had a view of a light well
Positive_Review: The Hotel is ideally situated for Theatre land the Embankment and other Attractions The staff were helpful and the food was reasonably good The room was comfortable and well equipped Breakfast is served in the Executive Dining room whilst the Standard Dining room is self service and very busy at peak time

Negative_Review: I asked three people about getting breakfast in my room Three answers but it wasn t solved I was left waiting for someone to bring me a door card to the room Which they didn t I went to bed Woke up no time to go to the dining room for breakfast so asked for refund on breakfast fee and had to get breakfast on the move
Positive_Review: Really high overall standard for the price

Negative_Review: inner sanctum of hotel derelict looking and requires face lift window of room looks out onto this Booking com failed to inform hotel of cancellation of a room which caused us delay and misunderstandings
Positive_Review: excellent position within easy walking distance of many of the capital s attractions Staff friendly and helpful Rooms comfortable and clean

Negative_Review: Breakfast price should be half what it is so we didn t have breakfast at the hotel Plenty of local places for this
Positive_Review: Highly convenient location in the West End Nice check in staff Allowed an early check in and then stored our luggage until the afternoon for free after checking out

Negative_Review: The room was a bit cold due to a breeze we couldn t stop the mirror in the room is directly facing the bed under the tv bit weird for me
Positive_Review: Great location 5mins from Charing Cross train station and Covent Garden

Negative_Review: Perhaps the duvets were a little too hot But that is our only complaint
Positive_Review: Everything was absolutely fine Staying here made our special weekend break even more special Thank you to you all

Negative_Review: Terrible check in and check out delays Useless wifi on three different devices I tried it was hopelessly slow Give the breakfast a wide berth esp the fruit juices if thats what they are
Positive_Review: Not much apart from the location

Negative_Review: Price of drinks Waiting too long to be served at the bar seemed like there was not enough bar staff about
Positive_Review: Location was perfect Staff really friendly and seemed to have genuine pleasure at making our stay enjoyable

Negative_Review: Room size rather small for the money it cost could be a lot less the smaller the room
Positive_Review: Close to all area and station everything pretty much right on the doorstep Restaurant very good Will definitely stay again no problem there

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Excellent Location Proximity to theatreland Sightseeing Museums Galleries Covent Garden Restaurants etc Great Indian food in hotel restaurant and friendly helpful staff Many thanks

Negative_Review: Check in very slow long queue and then room wasn t ready We felt room was very small for twin beds and the ensuite even smaller although it did have a good size shower cubicle Duvets were not wide enough to cover us once in the beds and room was draughty due to very old window frame despite a wooden shutter being placed over it
Positive_Review: Location of hotel superb Liked the touch of having doorman Luggage storage very efficient liked that we could leave luggage on day of departure until we were ready to catch train home Liked 12 noon checkout

Negative_Review: bed was a little hard as too were pillows outside our room was the service lift for staff facilities a little noisy could do with hot chocolate in the rooms as well as tea coffee
Positive_Review: perfect for the west end beautiful hotel would stay again just not in same room staff excellent very clean and fabulous idea with the shutters lovely shower room all round good experience

Negative_Review: Can not find any fault with the hotel or staff always perfect
Positive_Review: I have been staying at the Strand Palace for a Pre Christmas trip with my son from the age of 12 and we still continue the tradition at this great hotel now he is a 24 year old man We have always had a comfortable and enjoyable stay We enjoy the quality food and excellent customer service from the cheerful and obviously committed staff It is a joy to return each year

Negative_Review: Room was very small and not what we booked we got a queen bed instead of two singles and it virtually took up the whole room The booking was for my wife and her sister and they managed but not what we asked for The room was opposite the laundry and piles of sheets were everywhere including at the entrance to the room
Positive_Review: Staff were friendly and even checked us in early for free location was perfect breakfast was good

Negative_Review: The room was smaller than expected and it was odd to have a bed against the wall
Positive_Review: The hotel was ideal for where we needed to be the staff were lovely all areas neat and clean

Negative_Review: The only bad thing is that the walls are paper thin We could quite easily hear into the room next to us when they were speaking at a normal conversational level
Positive_Review: The location of the hotel was excellent Right in the heart of the west end You are a short walk from most West London attractions and an easy walk down to the City if you want to head down that way Most theatres are very close by and it s in a great location for Soho

Negative_Review: The receptionist when sorting our room said that the one he was allocating had a bath rather than a shower which we said we were happy with When we got to our room it did not have a bath Not a complaint merely an observation We were happy either way
Positive_Review: Location We were going to the Vaudeville Theatre and were delighted to find that the hotel was only a few hundred yards up the road Breakfast was very good too

Negative_Review: could not get the shower to work in the morning but did not raise this with hotel staff on check out
Positive_Review: Quiet and comfortable room with a good temperature in the room Very comfortable bed

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: It was Christmas time and the hotel decorations were luffly and warming The staff were very friendly helpful and attentive The room was very clean and perfect for a short stay in London But best of all was the location ideal for Covent Garden and the West End which was where we were going I highly recommend this hotel and will definitely stay here again when visiting this part of London

Negative_Review: The room was smaller than expected even the shower curtain seemed to make the bath narrower than a normal width
Positive_Review: Recommend the breakfast and carvery

Negative_Review: We dont stay in London very often so our comparison is based on country stays and the odd stay in London we thought the room was very nice comfortable well decorated clean and tidy However the bathroom was looking tired and worn That said the shower was great but needed two towels to mop up leakage round the side of the curtain
Positive_Review: The situation of the hotel is excellent Great staff in hotel and restaurants

Negative_Review: Did not find booking after waiting to check in for 30 mins I had received confirmation 3 hours prior Returned 4 hours later still hadn t found booking took another 30 mins to check in Room freezing because window won t close Housekeeping disturbs at 9 15 Hairdryer sets on fire Waited in queue to check out for 30 mins Gave up Sent email to hotel 24 hrs later no answer Can t deal with number of customers
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Hotel breakfast overpriced although given location it was easy to find somewhere reasonable to eat breakfast
Positive_Review: Excellent location near to Theatres Galleries Covent Garden transport links Clean comfortable attractive room was warm with stunning view Wooden shutters allowed us to reduce traffic noise at night Clean spacious bathroom with bath shower

Negative_Review: Just a little bit more attention to cleaning the bathroom would have made this almost perfect
Positive_Review: The fact that I keep coming back is testament to its friendliness comfort location and general wellbeing I was upgraded to a lovely double room with a view of the Strand a bit noisy all night but I could have closed the shutters

Negative_Review: Bed was a little to hard and the room was smaller that I expected considering we book an executive room With a view of a wall Breakfast although I requested to have the full English breakfast but with no mushrooms this would be forgotten
Positive_Review: Location is good staff were very helpful and cheerful

Negative_Review: The hotel bar was awful The cappacino u had was very expensive for a coffee but we where in London so expect it to be a little more expensive but when I pay nearly 7 for a coffee it would be nice for it to be hot a taste nice Then we had to wait another 15 mins just to get a replacement which wasn t much better I thought the decor and furniture was tired and for the prices charged i would expect a higher never of quility either that or put the prices down and I would have had a different expectation of the place
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Weak tea for breakfast and waitress appeared astonished we asked for another tea bag but did get us one
Positive_Review: The location was brilliant Right in the middle of the West End close to Covent Garden Theatreland and the Thames Very comfortable hotel

Negative_Review: We left a case with the left luggage reception the next day the person handling it was a bit off hand
Positive_Review: The bedroom was lovely huge bed the staff at the bar and on check in were great

Negative_Review: Room was in a noisy location noisy extractor fan from Kitchen noisy staff all night from nearby location noisy deliveries in street starting from 04 30 An awful place to sleep Room was nice enough for what it was but no TV as described very basic but at least it had a shower and toilet

Negative_Review: Booking com made a mistake and booked us in twice Your hotel was very unhelpful even though we only booked one room so NOT our fault I had to pay the cancellation fee Both you and Booking com blaming each other no one taking responsibility Was told the next day by your receptionist that I hadn t been charged a cancelletion fee But can see on my bank statement that I have Now Booking com are reneging and saying that I only had one room booked Great so who s going to refund the 179 17 to me Absolutely disgusted with the treatment It was my first wedding anniversary and you ruined it

Negative_Review: I booked through Booking com and registered myself and two children When we got to the hotel they had only registered two people and the room we got did not fit an extra bed so all three of us had to sleep in the same bed the first night The remaining four nights we were able to upgrade the room to a larger room so they could fit in an extra bed and I had to pay for the upgrade It was probably booking com s search engine that was to blame I had prepaid the hotelbill but when I checked out the receptionist asked me to pay for the stay again I m glad I was awake enough to remind her that I had already payed or it would have been a really expencive stay I was very happy with the hotel exept for those details

Negative_Review: No organisation on the front desk when required and stated on booking form for a cot bed in room there was none told to come back much later to which we did and still no cot bed eventually it arrived There are no baby changing facilities in toilets also paid for extra breakfast to be told when we went down in the morning that one of the two rooms where not down yet again poor communication from the reception staff that did our check in

Negative_Review: I had a baked bean that came out of my pot of coffee which put me off There was also bean juice on the spout of my milk jug and I did not have any beans with my breakfast The food was good but the cleanliness at breakfast in our experience was poor
Positive_Review: Location is fantastic just round the corner from Covent Garden and opposite The Savoy

Negative_Review: The wifi internet was not working well during our stay
Positive_Review: The location is super and the small room is clean and nice We enjoyed our stay in this hotel and I would book it again for our next trip

Negative_Review: It is not a cheap hotel however compared to like places around it seems very well priced for the offering
Positive_Review: lower cost hotel in Covent Garden area it was clean well maintained and based on value for money for the area an excellent choice The room had a single bed which was fine for solo traveler I was asked if I preferred shower or bath at check in

Negative_Review: The room was too small compared to the price Lack off fresh air The window opened up to back yard or a shaft from where various not so decent smells entered the room
Positive_Review: I enjoyed the the central location The gentle service from the staff working at the Hotel From cleaning lady to people at the reception

Negative_Review: My room view was bad
Positive_Review: The location is a very lively area and London eye Big Ben are 10 minutes walk I even used to walk to soho by night for the clubbing and party life

Negative_Review: Very expensive Paid for upgrade no airco in executive room and minimal hot water shower would be hot for about 2 mins and then go completely cold Obviously needs some work
Positive_Review: Fantastic location close to everything

Negative_Review: There wasn t anything we didn t like
Positive_Review: Our stay was fantastic from start to finish The staff were friendly and accommodating Our room was clean comfortable with everything we needed We would definitely come back in the future

Negative_Review: Executive room had no air conditioning lower grade rooms did so what is the extra cost for Location of executive rooms would be expected to be in the best places in the hotel not next to constantly humming generators outside the room The WiFi access was non existent in my travelling companion s room and only available in my room occasionally very poor around the rest of the hotel had to leave the hotel to pick up emails to check on business appointments Executive bathroom had old bath with a shower over it in urgent need of refurbishment Maintenance took over an hour to attend to TV problem at 22 00
Positive_Review: Location is great Carvery and Grill is excellent

Negative_Review: If you choose basic room cosy bed is just too smal for two people You have to upgrade room for bigger bed for additional cost
Positive_Review: Location in perfect particularly for turist and if you visit theaters

Negative_Review: The only problem was the fact that bath robes weren t already in the room and had to call up to have them brought to the room Not really a problem though
Positive_Review: We enjoyed the fact that they would do anything and everything for you to make your stay better

Negative_Review: The room was hideously small I reserved a standard single after staying in it for 3 days I m sure room 721 is a cosy single That s the hotel s code for a single room which is just slightly larger than a closet The elevated shower you have to climb up into it is tiny a bit of a hazard One slip on soap or water you will fall out of the shower down onto the sink The weather was warm with a breeze but as none blew in the window the room was stifling even with a fan I had to ask for a luggage rack ice bucket as none was provided I had only 1 towel for 3 nights until I requested more All in all it was a miserable stay
Positive_Review: The location is fabulous for anyone who wants easy access to tourist sites Covent Garden Trafalgar Square Thames cruises etc or Theatreland There are lots of eateries nearby along with late night convenience stores The Strand Palace is in a great location for accessing convenient transport by tube bus there are always tons of taxis

Negative_Review: When moved rooms the bins were emptied at 4 or 5 in their img also there wS too many noises waking us up at 3 onwards in the morning due to staff or workers loading or emptying bins
Positive_Review: Although our room was small it was cost also when asked to change rooms it was done quickly

Negative_Review: The room was really very small No air conditioning No double glazing no possibility to move the window A noisy night ok just for one night
Positive_Review: The location is excellent the bed was comfortable The information desk

Negative_Review: Wifi was really unstable The Blue red cards system to indicate if breakfast was included just made our stay difficult I had to get new keys every other day They didn t ask for the keys anyway just the room number
Positive_Review: No Positive

Positive_Review: Facilities location of the hotel are excellent Staff are very helpful

Negative_Review: definitely not a 4 hotel We had a leak in our hotel room ceiling phoned reception to complain and the receptionist told me she was too busy to deal with my complaint We then discovered the heating wouldn t work and the bathroom was dirty We demanded our money back and only then did we get escorted to another room No discount on price and no apology Quite disgraceful Will not be back
